abstract: Women@NBCU, a new unit that “offers advertisers access to female-friendly assets” of NBC Universal, has landed its first major client: Wal-Mart.
snippet: Women@NBCU, a new unit that “offers advertisers access to female-friendly assets” of NBC Universal, has landed its first major client: Wal-Mart.
lead_paragraph: Women@NBCU, a new unit that “offers advertisers access to female-friendly assets” of NBC Universal, has landed its first major client: Wal-Mart.

headline.main: NBC’s Female-Friendly Unit Appeals to Wal-Mart

abstract: Forget about support groups, posses and circles of friends. The first advertising deal for a new unit of NBC Universal, signed with Wal-Mart Stores, is all about the “momtourage.”
snippet: Forget about support groups, posses and circles of friends. The first advertising deal for a new unit of NBC Universal, signed with Wal-Mart Stores, is all about the “momtourage.”
lead_paragraph: Forget about support groups, posses and circles of friends. The first advertising sales deal for a new unit of NBC Universal  signed with Wal-Mart Stores  is all about the “momtourage.”

headline.main: To Reach Mothers, Wal-Mart Signs Deal With an NBC Unit
headline.print_headline: To Reach Mothers, Wal-Mart Signs Deal With an NBC Unit
